title: The Paramilitary CIA and the Seeds of a Secret War - LAOS 4
description:
We finally go to Laos, and explore the origins of the Secret War, the CIA coups, counter coups, and the beginnings of the paramilitary CIA.

Allen Dulles, Vang Pao, Souvanna Phouma, Operation White Star, Operation Millpond, JFK, and much more

We explore Laos from roughly 1955 to 1961

Please consider subscribing to my Patreon. I make no money off of YouTube ad revenue and all of Season 2 and the first videos of Season 3 are available there now.

Patreon:   / eyeswideopen408
